Message.Title: MAINSTREAM MEDIA (INLCUDING YAHOO) IGNORES ABORTION STORY
Message.Msg: Given the national media’s love affair with grotesque murders involving dead children or large numbers of victims, you’d think that a story about the brutal murder of dozens of screaming, writhing children would be the lead story in every American media outlet. You’d think wrong. When the story is about an abortion clinic in a poor, black neighborhood in Philadelphia, where a doctor routinely aborted full-term babies and, when they emerged alive and kicking, cut their necks with scissors, the national media falls silent. The Leftist American media is invested in a very specific abortion narrative, one that disregards entirely the value of human life...

Message.Title: CHICAGO — Not a single gun shop can be found in this city because they are outlawed.
Message.Msg: Handguns were banned in Chicago for decades, too, until 2010, when the United States Supreme Court ruled that was going too far, leading city leaders to settle for restrictions some describe as the closest they could get legally to a ban without a ban. Despite a continuing legal fight, Illinois remains the only state in the nation with no provision to let private citizens carry guns in public. March 9, 2013 1:21 PM CHICAGO (STMW) — One man is dead and at least six other people were wounded in weekend gun violence in Chicago.
